title: The maximum parking area that can be provided shall be decided by the Commissioner, Nagpur Municipal Corporation / the Chairman, Nagpur Improvement Trust, as the case may be, on considering the location of such site and the parking requirement
clause_text: The maximum parking area that can be provided shall be decided by the Commissioner, Nagpur Municipal Corporation / the Chairman, Nagpur Improvement Trust, as the case may be, on considering the location of such site and the parking requirement.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
